title: Bumiputera (Malaysia)
summary: Bumiputera or Bumiputra (Jawi: بوميڤوترا‎, Sanskrit: भूमिपुत्र) is a term used in Malaysia to describe Malays, the Orang Asli of Peninsular Malaysia, and various indigenous peoples of East Malaysia (see official definition below). The term is sometimes controversial, and has similar usage in the Malay world, used similarly in Indonesia and Brunei.
